name: Trial of Inari
description:
Play as a fox spirit trying to prove to be worthy enough to become a messenger of the Goddess Inari. Run with precision and collect lost souls to guide them back to their journey of afterlife. 

A classic zigzag runner game improved with animations and graphics. It is a student project of mine and this will be made free-to-play with no ads or microtransactions. 

Survive the snaky platform, accumulate as many score as you can, and challenge your friends.
